brief: Norway's Winter Olympics dominance continues with Boe-Roeiseland mixed relay today.
Johaug and Klaebo headline cross-country gold hunts this week in Italy.
Arsenal hold six-point lead as title race heats up with City-Fulham, Liverpool-Sunderland.

radar: Hovland tees off Thursday at iconic Pebble Beach Pro-Am, one of the PGA Tour's most prestigious events. Norwegian esports star rain's team Monte just completed their CS2 roster ahead of upcoming tournaments. Ruud recovering after bloody Olympic victory ‚Äî ATP schedule TBA.
